speaker.whotheyare: Ryan Merkley is the Chief Operating Officer at the Mozilla Foundation, and is dedicated to making the web a more user-friendly place.
speaker.whylisten: A native of Toronto, Canada, Ryan Merkley is the Chief Operating Officer at the Mozilla Foundation. He has devoted his career to "helping users of the web become makers of the web." Merkley advocates for open data initiatives, especially in regards to the public sector.
